title: Clash of Clans and Clash Royale mobile revenue 2018
summary: The statistics presents a forecast on the Clash_of_Clans of direct-to-home ( Clans ) Clash_of_Clans in Clash Royale 2018 .
The source projects that the Clash_of_Clans of Clans on the Clash_of_Clans market amounted to 567 million U.S. dollars .
gold: The statistic presents information on the mobile revenue generated by Clash of Clans and Clash Royale in 2018.
In the measured period , both of the Supercell 's games generated over 500 million U.S. dollars in revenue , with Clash Royale 's revenue reaching 597 million.
The game , released on the market in March 2016 , has been considerably more successful in terms of ARPUs .
